```{r setup, include = FALSE}
source("zHelpers.R")

## Database of datasets in FSA and FSAdata, with other packages appended
fish_db <- rbind(prepare_db("FSA"),prepare_db("FSAdata"))
```

```{r results='asis'}
for (i in topics) {
  cat("#",i)
  print(maketable(fish_db,i))
  cat("\n")
}
```
